name: atomicassetstickerbook
description: Cool way to watch Cryptomonkey's Collection

scripts.deploy:win: yarn build && cd build && copy index.html 200.html && surge . cryptomonkey-sticker-book.surge.sh
scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn build:css && cd build && cp index.html 200.html && surge . cryptomonkey-sticker-book.surge.sh
scripts.deploy:dev: yarn build && cd build && cp index.html 200.html && surge . testcmonkbook.surge.sh
